related_post.text: Hi guys I tried searching everywhere but what unicode encoding in Clojure using? It doesn't seem to be UTF8

so_post.text: Looks like the internal representation is UTF16: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9699071/whatisthejavasinternalrepresentionforstringmodifiedutf8utf16

comments: someone wants to know about encoding for clojure and they recieve an answer with an SO post link
